name: biomni-get-fda-drug-label-info

description: Retrieves FDA drug label information from the OpenFDA database
content:

Retrieves FDA drug label information from the OpenFDA database

command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/pharmacology/get_fda_drug_label_info.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
